message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a fairly aggressive discount on its true value.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to increase my offer. I would like to propose $11,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
